Package org.ginsim.core.service

Interface Service

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvatarService, AvatarServiceFacade, BNetFormatService, BoolsimFormatService, CADPExportService, CircuitService, CNetFormatService, CompositionService, FirefrontServiceFacade, FormatSupportService, GINMLFormatService, GNAFormatService, GraphComparatorService, GraphStructureExportService, ImageExportService, InteractionAnalysisService, LayoutService, LimitedSimulationService, LocalGraphService, LogicalTruthTableFormatService, LRGDocumentationService, MaBoSSExportService, ModelBooleanizerService, ModelReductionService, ModelReversionService, MonteCarloServiceFacade, NuSMVExportService, PetriNetAPNNFormatService, PetriNetINAFormatService, PetriNetPNMLFormatService, PolytopesService, PRISMExportService, Reg2DynService, RegGraphExportService, SATExportService, SBMLqualService, SCCGraphService, SimulationService, StableRegionsService, StableStatesService, TrapSpaceServiceWrapper, TruthTableFormatService
    public interface Service
    This interface is the central interface for GINsim services. GINsim services are separated in four kind of services, all of them represented by distinct abstract classes implementing this interface: - Import : those services correspond to data import from file of various format. They are represented by the GsImportService class - Export : those services correspond to data export to file of various format. They are represented by the GsExportService class - Layout : those services correspond to graph layout. They are represented by the LayoutService class - Action : those services correspond to various data management algorithm. They are represented by the GsActionService class Each new Service must extend one of these four abstract class and declare the annotation "@MetaInfServices(Service.class)"
    Author:
    Lionel Spinelli
